Shop Safely And Worry-Free On Shivam Medicals

Shivam Medicals is a renowned name in the online shopping of Over The Counter or healthcare products and other daily essentials. Ordering online on PharmEasy is convenient, fast and hassle-free; you can avoid the annoyance of queuing up at your local pharmacy and also avail of huge discounts of up to 80% OFF. Purchasing the healthcare requirements such as medical devices and nutritional supplements that you need will no longer burn a hole in your pocket. At PharmEasy, you are sure to find everything that you need because we have products across all healthcare categories.

Our most popular categories:

We have a range of categories and products, some which are:

Devices

With the pandemic upending our lives, we have all realized that there are some medical devices that we need to keep in our homes such as Oximeter, Thermometer, Inhaler, Blood pressure monitor, Glucometer.

Personal care

Personal care products can include a wide range of products such as Bath products, , Skincare essentials, Razor blades, Toothpaste and toothbrush, Wet wipes, Lip balm, Face masks, Hand sanitizer, etc.

Nutrition and fitness supplements

To give your health a helping hand, you can order a wide variety of health supplements including Health drinks, Nutritional powder, Nutrition tablets/capsules.
